Interface ec.vatimpl.Marker

public interface interface Marker
A Marker is an object which is told about e-references to other objects, generally via the method Inhabitant.vat$mark(). This is used for EGC and for the preparation of objects to be sent across the vat boundary.

mark(Object)
Tell this Marker about the given object.

mark 
 public abstract void mark(Object obj)
Tell this Marker about the given object.

Parameters:
obj - the object that is being e-pointed at
